page.title: 05BIOGRAPHY
page.content: Mr.Ron Lyon can see the Muirtown Basin from his house in Scorguie.He is a journalist reporter for our Evening Express which is read by a quarter of a million people.He is a fit,energetic grandfather who has run six marathons. This morning he rose at 05.45 to run 10 miles before he drove Mrs.Lyon to work.At his office Mr.Lyon telephoned the emergency services for any interesting incidents to report.Then he interviewed Provost Sellar about his heart operation.This is National Heart Week. This afternoon he will write a very unusual story about a church with too many members. Mr.Lyon knows Inverness well.He was a town councillor.He says he has been lucky to have a front seat at happy events as well as disasters.He has loved his job for 36 years.He is a really happy man.
